title: Edinburgh/New Town
name: ThaiPadThaiPod
directions: Follow London Rd down from the Omni Centre, it is on the left hand side. It's in the basement of ''Hotel Twenty''
content: Healthy portions of delectable Thai food cooked by chefs that once catered for the Thai Royal Family themselves. Eating food fit for Kings (and Queens) seems good for the many people that seem to fill it most nights. Nicely presented dishes in a cosy atmosphere and they definitely impress having only just opened their doors.
